text:
#99th To 100 Street West and Riverside Drive showing residence where Vaughan Kester wrote his first novel,"The Manager of the B&A.",1901. Later on he purchased Gunston Hall ,Fairfax County,Virginia,(about 1900),the home of George Mason.
Ref. Who's Who in America 1910-11
New York Times, July 6th, 1911.

Vaughan Kester B.Sept.12,1869
D.July 4th, 1911.

(20) The same.
(3) The same.
(4) The same.

No Record of Photographer. (Information from Paul Kester his brother.)

title: The Clifden, southeast corner Riverside Drive and 99th Street.
